name: Point of View (JDM2GGJ2021, TomasLongo, Luis Chaves)
name_original: Point of View (JDM2GGJ2021, TomasLongo, Luis Chaves)
description:
HIDE AND SEEK EVOLVED!

Try to find your opponent in a flat colored map, gain advantage by camouflaging on walls of your current color and finish the opponent before getting noticed!

CONTROLS:
WASD – Movement
Space Bar – Jump
CTRL – Crouch
Shift – Sprint
R - Reload
E – Change Color
ESC – Pause
Left Mouse – Shoot
Right Mouse – Aim

For this game you need to have Steam running on your computer in the background.

Made during Global Game Jam 2021.
